body:
On Wed May 12 2010 09:58:57 Jozsi Vadkan wrote: 
> sed -n '1,2p;4p' file.txt 
> 
> doesn't work. 
 
Works for me in Lenny. What output do you see? What version 
of sed do you have? 
 
--Mike Bird
